title: Hacking Ghost Karada Ni Shika Kachi No Nai
alternative_title: HACKING GHOST〜カラダにしか価値のない学園〜
status: HACKING GHOST〜カラダにしか価値のない学園〜
description:
Description :
        In an era where one in every twenty people awakens to a "special ability," Hiroto Takigami is a weak ability user who can only communicate with spirits. However, for some reason, his stepsister Rei, the most powerful ability user, harbors deep hatred toward him. The moment he graduates from an ability training institution and gains full control over his power, Rei kills him.
With only one year left to live—his "remaining lifespan" set—Hiroto falls into despair. Just then, a certain spirit appears before him, revealing an unexpected secret about his ability…
An unprecedented "body takeover" supernatural battle begins!
